      • StandaloneGame

        public StandaloneGame(java.util.List<Player> players,
                      int xDim,
                      int yDim,
                      int zDim,
                      int winningLength)
        Creates a game with specified dimensions of the board, winning length and random starter.
        Parameters:
        players - Players to play this game
        xDim - X dimension of the board
        yDim - Y dimension of the board
        zDim - Z dimension of the board, -1 specifies unlimited
        winningLength - Connected pieces required to win the game

      • play

        public void play()
        Runs the game. Game starts with an empty board and finishes when there is a winner or a draw (board is full). If one of the clients is making an invalid move, he is replaced by a Computer player with random strategy. If a computer player tries an invalid move //TODO

        Parameters:
        message - Message to print on the screen.
        yes - String that should be interpreted as "yes".
        no - String that should be interpreted as "no".
        Returns:
        true or false, depending on the input of the user.
